Title: Daitan Futeki ni Koi Shitai
Description: [Readyyy!, " is Sega's male idol training smartphone game. Within it is a 4-unit group called Just 4U. This is their official music video for their ", Daitan Futeki ni Koi Shitai, ' song. Just 4U is the second unit that received a short MV but the fourth unit to receive a full MV.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Readyyy Project Wikia)']
